title: Asia-Pacific Multi-Market Strategy

issues.title: Market-specific closing times not specified
issues.description: 'end of trading day' differs across markets - Tokyo 15:00 JST, Hong Kong 16:00 HKT, etc.
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Tokyo: 15:00 JST, Hong Kong: 16:00 HKT, Sydney: 16:00 AEDT/AEST, Singapore: 17:00 SGT, Mumbai: 15:30 IST'

issues.title: Timezone coordination not addressed
issues.description: Five markets in different timezones - signal timing relative to each market not clear
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Signals calculated using local market closing prices on same calendar date in each market's local timezone'

issues.title: Market holiday handling not specified
issues.description: Different markets have different holidays - behavior when some markets closed not defined
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'On local market holidays, no trades executed for that market. Signals recalculated on next trading day using most recent available prices'

issues.title: Simultaneous rebalancing impossible across timezones
issues.description: 'All markets rebalanced simultaneously' physically impossible given timezone differences
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify: 'Rebalancing executed at market open in each market on last Friday of month (local timezone), or next trading day if Friday is market holiday'

issues.title: Last Friday definition ambiguous across timezones
issues.description: Last Friday of month in Tokyo timezone differs from Hong Kong/Sydney due to date line
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Last Friday determined in UTC. Rebalancing occurs on that calendar date in each market's local timezone'

issues.title: Order placement timing not specified
issues.description: 'market open the next day' - opening times differ by market
issues.suggested_fix: Specify opening times: 'Tokyo: 09:00 JST, Hong Kong: 09:30 HKT, Sydney: 10:00 AEDT/AEST, Singapore: 09:00 SGT, Mumbai: 09:15 IST'

issues.title: Trading day definition not provided
issues.description: 'next trading day' behavior when Friday is holiday not specified
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'If last Friday is market holiday, rebalancing occurs on next trading day for that market'

issues.title: Daylight saving time not addressed
issues.description: Sydney observes DST (AEDT/AEST transition) affecting coordination with other markets
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'Timezone adjustments account for DST transitions in relevant markets (Australia). Fixed UTC offsets: Tokyo +9, Hong Kong +8, Singapore +8, Mumbai +5:30'

issues.title: Signal coordination timing not defined
issues.description: Markets close at different times - unclear if all signals wait for last market or calculated independently
issues.suggested_fix: Clarify: 'Signals calculated independently for each market immediately after local market close'

issues.title: Half-day trading sessions not addressed
issues.description: Some markets have half-day trading before holidays - handling not specified
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'On half-day trading sessions, signals calculated using half-day closing price at earlier local close time'

issues.title: Trading halt procedures not specified
issues.description: Circuit breakers or trading halts would affect signal calculation
issues.suggested_fix: Add: 'If trading halted, use last available price. If market remains closed next day, no new orders for that market'

issues.title: Calendar source not specified
issues.description: Need authoritative source for market holiday calendars across five exchanges
issues.suggested_fix: Specify: 'Market calendars from respective exchange official sources: JPX (Tokyo), HKEX (Hong Kong), ASX (Sydney), SGX (Singapore), NSE (Mumbai)'

notes: Critical ADR-018 example - complex timezone and multi-market calendar coordination issues
